summary: A sword from the Anime Hagure Yuusha No Estetica.
descriptionHtml:
The Laevateinn
=======================================

This is the Laevateinn from the anime series Hagure Yuusha No Estetica Sword. This sword is the magnificent creation of Akatsuki Ousawa "The Hero" He created this sword with his magic powers and now it has been brought into Skyrim!

This sword can be forged at any Blacksmith forge, it can be found under the Daedric Category and be crafted for only 5 Ebony Ingots! And it can even be enchanted!

Get this fascinating master sword today!

Releases
==========================

Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=114342840
GameBanana: http://gamebanana.com/skyrim/skins/122725
author: Rafael De Jongh
